description:
Kuroitsu creates a new monster, Hydra, to take out Blader. Unfortunately, budgetary concerns have caused most of the new monster`s functionality to be omitted... and Blader appears to be in a big hurry!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alors que le démon mille fois ressuscité se débat pour briser ses fers, il est possédé par une âme enchaînée par le destin
Ikudomo no Shi o Kurikaesu Yomigaerishi Mamono ga, Sono Kase o Tatsu Beku Aragau, Unmei ni Shibarareta Tamashii ni Miirareru Sono Toki
The Monster in a Perpetual Cycle of Death and Rebirth Struggles to Break Its Chains Until Seduced by a Soul Entrapped by Destiny
幾度もの死を繰り返す蘇りし魔物が, その枷を断つべく抗う, 運命に縛られた魂に魅入られるその時
